mapper.select: select m.mfrsname,b.brandname,u.unitname, s.`id`,s.`produc_num`,s.`produc_code`,s.`produc_name`,s.`mfrsid`,s.`brandid`,s.`factory`,s.`produc_factory`, s.`proid`,s.`unitid`,s.`batchid`,s.`leixing`,s.`tax`,s.`tax_price`,s.`trade_price`,s.`transfer_price`,s.`retail_price` from aa_shiguang s left join c_mfrs m on s.mfrsid=m.mfrsid left join c_brand b on s.brandid=b.brandid left join c_unit u on s.unitid= u.unitid where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_shiguang where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select m.mfrsid,m.mfrsname from c_mfrs m left join cc_mg mg on m.mfrsid=mg.mfrsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=9
select b.brandid,b.brandname from c_brand b left join cc_mg mg on b.goodsid = mg.goodsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=9 and b.mfrsid = #{mfrsid} group by b.brandid;
